jobDescription: Our client is a rapidly growing B2B  mobile solutions, Predictive Analytics, and Cloud system integration provider  that specializes in custom solutions and enterprise level software development.  Due to growth, they are hiring a Data Scientist/Data Modeler. Responsibilities Provide technical leadership to the clients  Development Teams in areas such as Machine Learning, Data mining,  Predictive Analytics and AI  Lead the way in leveraging unstructured data for  predictive modeling and decision-making.  Help build a predictive product and inform features at  the ground level.  Work on forecasting, process improvement, and delivering  insights to the leadership  Lead/facilitate technical strategy and brain storming  sessions.  Support proposal development across the capture  lifecycle from solution development, reviews, estimations (development  cost, resource, and technology)  Experience  More than 2-years of experience in Data sciences or  Master's in mathematics, statistics, computer science, or related, and  more than 5-years of relevant quantitative and qualitative research and  analytics  Proven professional experience delivering revenue  generating products  R (Shinny), Scala, and Python experience  Big Data frameworks (Hadoop, MapReduce, Spark, Kafka,  etc.)  Proven experience programmatically extracting data from  a database/API  Cloud Hosting Experience (AWS, Azure, Google Tensorflow  etc.)  Agile / Scrum Development management experience  Familiarity with mobile development a plus  Apply
